TUTORIAL.NODE: Use the [UP] key to jump!
Oink! hey chef, try to collect all the rice grains in each level!
Squeak! Use the [UP] and [DOWN] arrows to climb ladders.
Oink! Lose a life and you'll re-appear at the last checkpoint.
Broccoli King: Doors of the Nom God can only be opened by eating all the Noms indicated on them.
Mooo! Some platforms won't shift unless you are heavy. A nice juicy burger might help you bulk out a bit?
Squeak! It's harder to walk and jump when overweight! Burn some fat by holding the [X] key to exercise.
Oink! Drop something heavy on a cracked floor to break through to the other side.
Cluck! Give yourself a spring up to high platforms but it helps not to be too fat.
Cluck! Some vines hanging from trees can be climbed.
Squeak! A spike in the bum hurts. Don't touch them!
Mooo! A fall from the world means instant death. So don't do it.
Mooo! You can grab and move pushable blocks with the [X] key as well as punching them along too!
Cluck! Jumping on clouds is almost as fun as flying!
Oink! Ok pigs can't fly, but you can use the [ARROW KEYS] to swim around!
Press [R] at any time to re-spawn at a checkpoint and reset the level.
Squeak! You'll need a speed boost to make it across here!
Hey kids! Check out new McFatass Burnt Bits. Radiated and fried each day, feared by Noms and Chefs everywhere.
Squeak! Burnt Bits are like zombie Noms, they will chase you down - and hurt you if touched.
Hey kids! Burnt Bits just love hunting for Noms, unless you land on one of course.
Oink! Burnt Bits are stealing Noms. If they grab one try to rescue it.
Oink! A stunned Burnt Bit can be thrown. They make handy missiles to destroy other enemies.
Squeak! Burnt Bits hate water. If they fall (or are thrown) into it they turn to mush.
Cluck! I can't fly but grab a flapping Burnt Bit and enjoy the ride.
Cluck! Oven Burnt Bits are harder to kill and can't be stunned. Jumping on them makes them open up.
Mooo! Throwing Noms at an enemy will make them drop what they are carrying.
Mooo! Burnt Bits can be crushed by dropping something big and heavy on them.
If you can't stun a Burnt Bit, you can lob a pot at it instead. Pots also make handy platforms if dropped.
Cluck! If you are thin, Burnt Bits won't bother attacking you, but you take more damage if you touch them.
Cluck! Perhaps if you went super skinny you might be able to slip down a gap or two?
Squeak! Dancing by a BoomBox help you lose weight fast. Hold [X] in front of them to exercise and feel the burn.
Oink! Even vomit has its uses, spew at your enemies to push them around.
Some items can be picked up. Simply stand close and tap [X] to grab it.
When super skinny, you're more at risk of injury. Just eat some good food to put weight back on again.
Welcome to the Land of Fire: Gas, flame, fat and grill. Combine a strength and gas Nom to really get your ring burning.
Welcome to my big chill, the Frozen Land, deep in ice and snow. Ever eaten a speed and strength Nom together?
Artificial looks are everything round here, who cares about the consequences right? Try a speed and gas Nom together!
Smokin'! Hot oil in the Fire Caves will drain your energy fast.
Swimming in freezing cold water burns lots of energy. Bulk up a bit to survive longer.
Take a dip in McFatass Acid Soda (TM). Prolonged exposure rots teeth, body and mind.
Follow the path through the cave and woods to find the lost page from the Book of Nom.
Hey Kids! Pick up a delicious crappy meal today. It's totally full of junk!
Press the Nom God's golden altar block to return all the blocks to their original state.
All hail Slimcat, the slimmest of the Feline race
Stroke the legendary Slimcat and you too shall become skinny
Slimcat, the cutest way to get thin!
Dear fellow designers. I don't care how much you love easter, stop filling levels with eggs. :) - Duncan
I can't remember what I had to say here, but i'm sure it was enlightening.

MENU.HELP_VITALITY_CONTENT: Protect your body from damage by eating Noms containing calcium, iron, magnesium, beta carotene and vitamins B, C and D.
MENU.HELP_MAGIC_CONTENT: Gain an extra life by eating Noms from all five different food groups.
MENU.HELP_NOMS_CONTENT: Earn yourself a Munchelin star rank by tasting as many Noms as you can.
MENU.FB_THANKS_MESSAGE: Thank you for posting Nom Nom Nation to Facebook.
MENU.FB_SEEDED_MESSAGE: To post to facebook you have to play on www.playnomnation.com. Go there now?
MENU.WIN_POPUP_TITLE: FOUND A BOOK OF NOM PAGE
MENU.SHARED_WARNING_MESSAGE: Nom Nation does not store any personal data. If you do not 'Allow' local data you will lose your progress on closing or refreshing the window. Change this now?
